titleStmt.title: Anarchia Anglicana: or, the history of independency. The second part Being a continuation of relations and observations historicall and politique upon this present Parliament, begun anno 16. Caroli Primi. By Theodorus Verax.
History of independency. Part 2.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Clement, 1595-1651.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare, M. DC. XL. IX. [1649]

notesStmt.note: With errata on p. [6], and marginal notes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
